result.reason: Adding smart connection groups (Connected, Recent) to the tree view enhances navigation and session management efficiency.
result.approach: Implement dynamic tree nodes (Smart Nodes) in the Connection Tree that automatically populate with currently connected sessions and a history of recently used connections, likely updating on connection state change events.
